metadata.title: CVE-2024-39330 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
Derived classes of the django.core.files.storage.Storage base class whichoverride generate_filename() without replicating the file path validationsexisting in the parent class, allow for potential directory-traversal viacertain inputs when calling save(). Built-in Storage sub-classes were notaffected by this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-39330` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.23
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.23').
